alert.note: Alert for Rota; Saipan; Tinian (Marianas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 18 at 4:13PM ChST until January 19 at 6:00AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CHST FRIDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Rota, Tinian and Saipan, especially higher elevations. * WHEN...Until 6 AM Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong high pressure continues to build in well to the north of the Marianas and the shear line boundary has dropped well to the south of Guam. A broad expanse of strong northeast winds will persist across the islands tonight, gradually weakening Friday and into the weekend.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
